file_content.text: Buzz off, I'm gettin' cozy.
You done?
Keep buggin' me an' you're gonna lose more than just your shot at this stash.
Don't even think about ditchin' me.
Stupid, rotten bounty hunters. Just wait, just you wait.
Ain't runnin' nowhere now, is he?
Gettin' close to somethin', already smell the blood.
Nothin' in this stinkin' pit's gonna stop me from guttin' Zale. Nothin'.
Check and... check. I think we found something. Boot her up.
--done all we can. If the Imperials want those prisoners, they'll have to crack them out of the tomb. It's out of our hands now.
You can evacuate, warden, but I've spent too many years putting those fiends away to let it all be for nothing. Come on, Em. We're heading to the tomb!
Dispose of the droid, I'm finished here.
That's all I needed to know.
Hopefully Zale hasn't changed his game plan since we last saw him.
We could be back on track.
Is that all this heap can remember?
I was hoping for more.
There are some other uncorrupted memory sectors, but we'd need more time to search through them.
What's this tomb they're talking about?
This mean anything to you two?
Gives us an idea where he's headed.
Well, that's a start.
This is what you bothered me for?
You call this helpful?
I'm sorry! I don't have a lot to work with. Just memory sectors and time stamps.
If the little punk's tryin' to keep the Imps from gettin' in the tomb, he's only got one way to go.
This man you're after, if he is already inside the tomb, you may as well forget about him. The things down there are loose.
I didn't bust all the way outta max to miss my shot at that twerp!
I've been down there before.
The tomb's not a problem.
Leave them alone. I got it covered.
Calm down.
If the Empire has a plan for getting in the tomb, I know someone who can clue us in.
We'll follow the Imperials in.
Leave them alone. I think I know someone who can help.
Calm down. I got it covered.
Thank our friends here for their help. I've got a call to make.
Take care of these two.
My pleasure.
No! Please don't! We did what you asked! No!
Barrows's trail leads to the tomb. I need you to help narrow the search.
No sightings of your target thus far, but very few of our forces have made it inside.
I'm transmitting the last known coordinates of Operations Group Two. They were searching for Imperial prisoners; following them should lead you toward Zale's objective.
Ground teams are trying to get us access to the tomb's computers, so by the time you reach those coordinates, I should have more to go on.
My target's last known destination is something the locals are calling "the tomb." What can you tell me?
Unfortunately, everything we know about the tomb comes from the Republic's limited records.
It appears that most of the interaction the Republic had was with the tomb's custodial droids, and only "samples" were normally allowed to enter.
My intel says the tomb's been overrun.
What am I walking into?
I can confirm that. Samples were released after Operations Group One and Two forced their way inside. Something called Esh-kha.
Would presenting myself to the custodians be an option?
Could the droids be persuaded?
The droids retreated inside the tomb when Operations Group One and Two forced their way through. All contact has been lost.
What do you mean by "samples"?
Samples?
Best guess? Life-forms, based on the contents of the vaults thus far. For what purpose? Your guess is as good as mine.
We do know the Republic turned their Imperial prisoners over to the tomb's custodians to prevent their recovery.
All of our efforts are focused on regaining entry.
Put me in touch with your officer on the ground.
Who's in charge of getting in?
We should cooperate.
That would be appreciated. The situation on the ground appears to be rapidly deteriorating.
I thought nobody's been inside.
Regaining entry?
A few of our teams were able to force their way inside, but their actions appear to have set loose things best left imprisoned.
Commander Grang is in charge of gaining re-entry to the tomb. He'll be able to give you the current situation.
However you get through, if you can reach these coordinates, contact me. I'll bring you up to speed on any discoveries.
I'm comin' along. I ain't been waitin' this long for someone else to have the pleasure of killin' Zale.
You get me that twerp, I show you where the law hides all the contraband on this rock. Deal?
Follow my lead, or I cut you loose. Got it?
Just don't cross me.
Gonna boss me around, huh? Fine.
But your friend takes a hike, too--case you're thinkin' you can pull somethin'.
I should keep an eye on you.
You should let your money do the talking more often.
That's more like it.
Don't push it.
Your friend takes a hike, too--case you're thinkin' you can pull somethin'.
Boss really want Blizz to leave boss alone with big ugly man?
Suits me just fine.
All these cells starting to make you nervous?
Calling it a day already?
After today, I think I've done more than my time.
Your concern is touching.
You could pretend to care.
I'm sure you two will get along fine. You can compare knee-breaking techniques.
What? I think even he knows better than to get fresh with you.
Next time, I'll pack your lunch and bring your coat.
Don't trust him.
What? No way.
Stay on call.
I've got it for now, Blizz. Don't wander too far.
Blizz be ready! Boss be careful... ugly man too.
Don't get too comfy. I might need you.
That'll be the day.... I'll keep my comm handy.
I don't plan to. Keep your comm open.
Do as he says, Mako. I'll be in touch if I need you.
He won't give me any trouble.
If the Houk wants to pay for an escort, I'll let him.
Relax, it's easy money.
Boss know best. Bye, ugly man.
Cross her, you'll regret it.
Cross him, you'll regret it.
All right, but bantha-neck over there doesn't strike me as a safe bet.
Why do I get the feeling you two working together is going to be trouble?
Just be careful.
Let's go.
Thought I smelt somethin' burnin'. Found us a couple "volunteers."
You can't be serious. You want us to try and fix this? There's hardly anything here worth salvaging!
It is pretty much junked.
Shut up, and work.
Nobody asked your opinion.
I only need to get inside its head. Find me something telling me where this man is going.
Just pull the memory core.
I--I think we can handle that. Dean, grab a diagnostic pad and a holo-emitter. This might take a little while.
We done, right? We better be done. I wanna kill 'em. I wanna kill 'em right now.
I got an idea how to get this heap talkin'. There's lots more junk like this thing, walkin' around keepin' the runts in line.
They get built at a plant deeper in. Bet there's parts to hot-wire this trash an' shock some answers out of it.
Show me this droid plant.
Take me there.
Not the worst idea I've ever heard.
Worth a shot.
Course it ain't.
If this is a dead end, you're taking a one-way trip.
You better hope you're right.
I ain't takin' the trip, yet.
Place's inside max lockup. Ain't gettin' in there without some major boom-booms and I only got this dinky piece.
You blast the place up; I'll haul this junk over and grab us a couple tech heads on the way. Deal?
Deal.
Good excuse to blow stuff up.
I'll go along with it.
Dirty! Rotten!
What happened to Barrows?
Where's Zale?
Any particular reason you trashed that droid?
What, exactly, are you doing?
'Cause it was here!
You let him get away, didn't you?
Let me guess. Got outsmarted?
It ain't my fault!
The rat scurried down this little hole while you were takin' your sweet time wreckin' the place.
Tin can wouldn't give up where he was goin'. Guess I broke it.
You just became a problem for me, Houk. You've got three seconds to come up with a solution.
That was my only lead.
Can you fix what's left of this thing?
Blizz, anything you can do?
Blizz fix anything for boss! Um, this look like it used to be manipulator arm... no, maybe scomp link actuator....
It'd be in better shape if it fell from orbit.
That's an understatement.
Yeah? Wait 'til you see what I do to its boss.
You can't beat answers out of a droid, moron.
So you smashed it... idiot.
Moron's what I call runty bounty hunters dumb enough to pick fights.
Start blastin' generators or I'm gonna beat down this field with your face.
This ain't a show. Scram!
